input.sentences: `` is it time to open my gift ? '' grandpa asked .
`` sure . go for it . `` | exclaimed his granddaughter .
`` hey ! it 's free year membership to the bacon of the month club ! '' said grandpa .
`` did you say bacon ? '' exclaimed the dogs as they ran toward the family .
`` bacon ? no | all i got was the teapot . `` | grandpa said to the dogs
output.sentences: When the time came, grandpa began the gift giving.
Granddaughter exclaimed it was time, called in the family dogs for their gifts.
First gift was a one-month membership at doggie gym.
The family dogs ran about and the family exclaimed.
The next gift was a teapot with tea for dogs.
